page.title: 09ANIMAL LIFE
page.content: The most often seen animals in peoples gardens are hedgehogs and squirrels. Hedgehogs often nest in gardens,{12% } of people having them live there. The other animals that have been seen are weasels, rats, shrews, toads, bats lizards, foxes, squirrels, mice, water voles and frogs. Foxes are seen quite often nowadays, which surprised us. We were also surprised that there are no rabbits. Only hedgehogs are fed by people but we found that{9%}fed them, more than we expected. When we asked if people took in a sick or injured animal more than half of the people said they did. Although we live near the countryside when we asked, "Do you agree with fox hunting?"{79% of people said they didn't agree,{12% said yes, {4%}didn't reply and {1%}didn't mind. Obviously a lot of people think fox hunting is cruel.
